articles.title: The Bison is back: Indiana Hoosiers announce return of beloved '60s mascot
articles.description: Hoosier the Bison is returning home to Indiana University, the school announced in a video on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Hoosier the Bison is returning home to Indiana University.

articles.description: A first lady spokesperson shut down “completely false" theories that the president is warring with Harvard because their son, Barron, was supposedly not accepted to the school.

articles.title: Kourtney Kardashian Thinks Going to School Is ‘Dated’
articles.description: Kourtney Kardashian has been asking herself, ‘Why do kids f- - -ing go to school?’ Thanks to some helpful videos her kids sent her, she’s decided the practice is ‘dated.’

articles.title: Thomas and Alito dissent from refusal to hear 'Two Genders' student T-shirt appeal
